# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

[Unreleased]: https://gitlab.hyva.io/hyva-themes/magento2-payment-icons/-/compare/2.0.0...main

## [2.0.0] - 2025-01-10

[2.0.0]: https://gitlab.hyva.io/hyva-themes/magento2-payment-icons/-/compare/1.0.0...2.0.0

### Added
- New Payment icon options
- Two new styles, **Clean** and **Outline**
- New build tools to optimize icon size

### Changed
- Update payment icons to the current logo style

### Fixed
- Moved SvgIcons argument from global scope to frontend and adminthtml scope

### Removed
- All older icons including all Russian Payment methods
